channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal/Spring -- Spring-flex
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal/Spring -- Spring-flex

item.title: CVE-2017-3203|2024-08-05T14:16:28.225Z -- pivotal%2Fspring -- spring-flex
item.description: The Java implementations of AMF3 deserializers in Pivotal/Spring Spring-flex derive class instances from java.io.Externalizable rather than the AMF3 specification's recommendation of flash.utils.IExternalizable. A remote attacker with the ability to spoof or control an RMI server connection may be able to send serialized Java objects that execute arbitrary code when deserialized.
